sections.title: What is “Deals”?
bullets: Deals is a free mobile app that helps users find and use discount codes and promotional offers from top brands and stores.

sections.title: How do I use a promo code?
bullets: Simply tap the promo code, and you'll be redirected to the merchant's site or app.
Paste the code during checkout to receive your discount.

sections.title: Are all promo codes valid?
bullets: We strive to keep our promo codes updated, but some codes may expire or be withdrawn by merchants at any time.

sections.title: Is there a cost to use this app?
bullets: No. “Deals” is 100% free to download and use.

sections.title: Do I need to create an account?
bullets: Creating an account is optional, but recommended to save your favorite deals and get alerts for new promotions.

sections.title: Do you share my data with anyone?
bullets: We only share limited data with trusted third-party services for analytics and offer tracking.
We never sell your personal information.
